title: 198. Andy, Sal & DJ CTI: North Korea Ban, Californians Ignoring Newsom's Mandate & Congress Members Using The Stock Market
itunes:title: 198. Andy, Sal & DJ CTI: North Korea Ban, Californians Ignoring Newsom's Mandate & Congress Members Using The Stock Market
description: In today's episode, Andy, Sal & DJ discuss North Korea's Kim Jong Un banning laughing, drinking & shopping for 11 days on the death anniversary of his father, Californians ignoring Gavin Newsom's statewide mask mandate, and if members of Congress should be allowed to buy & sell in the stock market.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy, Sal & DJ discuss North Korea's Kim Jong Un banning laughing, drinking & shopping for 11 days on the death anniversary of his father, Californians ignoring Gavin Newsom's statewide mask mandate, and if members of Congress should be allowed to buy & sell in the stock market.
